text: @steve_vladeck May @VP & his staff enjoy their cases case of covid-19. Just how stupid r u people. We have over 113,000 dead Americans & continuing to rise. It is NOT over clowns. For a person in charge of the task force of covid-19 u r stupider than dirt. U need to listen to Doctors.
